article:
It can take you a day out to Singapore  because of the plane. Singapore is one of the most beautiful countries in Asia . There are lots of visitors _ to the country every year. But were you there years ago? Great changes have taken place in the country. For many Chinese tourists , this small island country in _ Asia is a wonderful place to take a _ . On one hand, more than three _ of people are Chinese. _ you can simply  speak Chinese with most of the local people. On the other hand, Singapore is an English-speaking country, so it is also a good place to _ your English.
Did you ever try Chinese food outside China? Maybe you are afraid that won't be able to find anything to eat in a foreign country. In Singapore however, you'll find a lot of _ from China; you won't have any problem finding rice, noodles, or dumplings. However, if you're feeling brave, Singapore is an excellent place to try new food. Whatever you like Indian  food, Western food, or Japanese food, you'll find it all in Singapore.
One great thing about Singapore is that the temperature is almost the same all year _ . You needn't wear _ clothes because it is warm in all the seasons.
